title: Notice
content:
wffweb-3.0.4 is released instead of wffweb-3.0.3, upgrade your project now. It contains lot of major improvements for multi-threading environment.
It will deliver better performance for UI updates because its internal algorithm for generating UI data for updating client (browser page) is upgraded. Visit webfirmframework.com/demo for experience. Please know that your donations make this framework alive. If your company would like to become a sponsor or if you prefer to donate using other platforms, please contact tech-support@webfirmframework.com. Sponsors will be provided invoice for their accounting purpose and their company logo with link will be published in this website and github website.
